content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=2.5) and chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the entities are not already connected to other entities in a way that would prevent the connection.
- Verify that the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities or pipes.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile where you want to place the entity is not occupied by another entity.
- Make sure that you have the necessary resources to place the entity.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine.
- Make sure that the burner mining drill is not out of range of the resource it is trying to mine.

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt.
- Make sure that the furnace is not already full of output.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to heat water.
- Make sure that the boiler is not already full of steam.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is placed in a valid location before attempting to pump water.
- Make sure that the offshore pump is not already pumping water.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine has a valid input and output before attempting to generate power.
- Make sure that the steam engine is not already generating power.

### Errors when using labs
- Ensure that the lab has a valid input and output before attempting to research.
- Make sure that the lab is not already researching.

### Errors when using chests
- Ensure that the chest is placed in a valid location before attempting to store items.
- Make sure that the chest is not already full of items.

### Errors when using burners
- Ensure that the burner has fuel before attempting to burn.
- Make sure that the burner is not already burning.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has a valid input and output before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure that the inserter is not already inserting items.

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure that the pipe is placed in a valid location before attempting to transport fluids.
- Make sure that the pipe is not already transporting fluids.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group is valid before attempting to transport fluids.
- Make sure that the pipe group is not already transporting fluids.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that the electricity group is valid before attempting to transport electricity.
- Make sure that the electricity group is not already transporting electricity.
